title: Content Producer-Australian Sports Mobile - Sports Media
text: Posted/Updated: 10-02-2015 Brief Job Description: Looking for a Content Producer, who will work in our London office, with a focus on Australian sports mobile and social producing. Incumbent will program breaking news, commentary and analysis on   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
